snippet: Monte Kiffin has returned to the N.F.L. after spending the last four seasons working with his son in the college ranks.
lead_paragraph: Monte Kiffin has returned to the N.F.L. after spending the last four seasons working with his son in the college ranks.

headline.main: With Kiffin as Coordinator, Cowboys Are Hunting for Turnovers
headline.print_headline: With Kiffin as Coordinator, Cowboys Are Hunting for Turnovers
